name: Healthy Green Enchiladas
ingredients: 4 chicken breasts 3 (10 oz.) cans green enchilada sauce
2 T. fresh cilantro chopped 1 cup shredded monterey jack cheese
steps: Bake, grill, or boil chicken. Shred and set aside.
Pour 2 cans enchilada sauce into bowl and microwave two minutes. Dip each tortilla in sauce then fill with
chicken mixture. Roll up, seam side down, in greased 9x13 pan. Pour remaining sauce over it and sprinkle
tip with cheese. Bake at 350° for about 15 minutes. Serve over shredded lettuce. Top with avocado, salsa,
light sour cream and extra cilantro.
